# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::AbstractString; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, r"\\s+")
    lines = String[]

    for word in words
        line = ""
        line *= last(lines, "") * " " if isempty(lines) || length(lines[end]) + length(word) > text_width
        line *= word
        lines = [line] âˆª lines
    end

    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example
wrap_string("This is a long string that needs to be wrapped at 10 characters per line.", 10)
```

Output:
```
"This is a long string that needs to be\nwrapped at 10 characters per line.\n"
```
